HeroSection.title: Find your style with Clothica today!
HeroSection.text: Clothica is a place where comfort meets style. We create basic clothes that are easy to combine and suitable for any occasion. Choose things that emphasize your individuality and will always be relevant.

StyleSection.title: Choose your unique style today
StyleSection.card1Text: only soft-to-touch fabrics that keep their shape even after dozens of washes.
StyleSection.card2Text: basic colors and minimalist style that are easy to combine with each other.
StyleSection.card3Text: clothes that do not restrict movement and are suitable for any situation.

Footer.subscribeText: Join our newsletter to stay updated on news and promotions.
